title: The Count of Monte Cristo
author: alexandre-dumas
summary: Edmond Dantès is unjustly imprisoned and escapes to become the wealthy Count of Monte Cristo, exacting elaborate revenge on those who betrayed him. One of the most popular adventure novels ever written.

attribution.note: Book data from Open Library (openlibrary.org), part of Internet Archive.

description: Thrown in prison for a crime he has not committed, Edmond Dantes is confined to the grim fortress of If. There he learns of a great hoard of treasure hidden on the Isle of Monte Cristo and becomes determined not only to escape but to unearth the treasure and use it to plot the destruction of the three men responsible for his incarceration.
